==Trivia==
*Charged Attacks leave an impression of the seal on the ground &mdash; most noticeable on sand or ice. With more scarlet seals, the mark is stronger. The impression left has been interpreted to be highly stylized version of the Chinese glyphs for 福 (blessing), 椂 or 祿 (prosperity), 商 (business), and 印 (seal or stamp). (See also [[Liyue Language]])
